body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.38 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Better support for memory allocations debugging.
Improved MIDI support.
A wide range of Direct3D fixes.
OLEDB fixes (should fix Clipart in Office).
Improved debugger support on x86-64.
Many MSI fixes.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
